Definitions.Paraphrase:
get by one's own work, skill, etc.
获得；学到
He acquired a knowledge of the language by careful study. 
他通过认真学习掌握了这门语言。
The company has recently acquired a new office building in central Shanghai. 
这家公司最近在上海市中心买了一栋新的办公楼。

1. unable to be diseased or hurt because of special powers in oneself
免疫的
HIV damages the human defense method which makes humans  immune to diseases.
艾滋病毒破坏人体中抵御疾病侵袭的防御机制。 
The medicine will make you immune to the disease.
这种药可以使你免于感染这种疾病。
2. protected from
免除的
The man was told that he would be immune from punishment if he helped the police. 
这个人得知如果他帮助警察，就可免受处罚。
These goods are not immune from customs duties. 
这些商品不免税。

the state of having none or not enough of 
不足，缺乏;缺点,缺陷
The deficiencies in the plan are very clear and it can not succeed.
这个计划的不足之处是显而易见的，因而是不可能成功的。
The officer was quite worried about the deficiency in the supply of water. 
这位军官很担心水供应不足。

a set of qualities, happenings, methods, etc., common to a general condition
（具有共同性的性质，事件，症状等的）集合
The syndrome is likely to strike those whose immune ability is damaged. 
那些免疫系统受到破坏的人身上可能出现这些症状。 
The doctor  diagnosed the patient's syndrome from the test results.  
医生是根据对病人的检验结果做出诊断的。

discover the nature of (a disease) 
诊断; 判断
The doctor diagnosed my disease as a unique bone disease. 
医生把我的病诊断为罕见的骨骼疾病。
After diagnosing the patient's disease, these doctors discussed how to treat it. 
医生们经过对这个病人的病情诊断之后, 就讨论如何治疗的问题。

1. put disease into the body of (someone) 
感染
Anyone with a bad cold may infect the people around him. 
得重感冒的人会使周围的人受到感染。
He was shocked when he knew he was infected with the  HIV virus. 
当他知道自己染上艾滋病毒时感到很震惊。
2. affect; influence
影响
He thought that parents might infect their children with their ideas. 
他认为家长的观念会影响孩子。

a living thing which can cause  a spreading disease in the body, in plants 
病毒
Nearly all the people infected with the AIDS virus will die.
The medicine is very effective in controlling the spread of the virus.
 这种药能有效地控制这种病毒的传播。

of or like the countryside 
农村的
The old man prefers the rural life to the life in the city.
在农村生活和城市生活之间，这位老人更喜欢前者。
People living in rural areas are likely to be more friendly than those living in the city. 
生活在农村的人或许比生活在城里的人更友好些。

make up; form 
组成
Girls constitute 20 percent of the student population in the university. 
女生占这所大学学生总数的百分之二十。                             
Twelve people constitute a research group. 
12个人组成一个研究小组。

any of the parts into which something may be divided
部分
The waiter gave me a dish of orange segments.
侍者给我送上一盘桔片。
Black people constitute the poorest segment of society in the country. 
黑人是这个国家最穷的社会群体。

sudden fear and worry; a warning of danger
惊慌；警报

sudden fear and worry; a warning of danger
使惊慌，使担心
Hearing a scream, she sat up in alarm. 
听到尖叫声，她慌忙坐起来。
In his speech the worker emphasized the government's alarm over the strike. 
这个工人在演讲中强调了政府对这次罢工事件所表现出的慌恐。
cause sudden fear or worry
使惊恐,使担心
The news that war might break out alarmed the people. 
战争可能爆发的消息使人们惊恐不安。

联邦的，联邦制的
联邦政府
federal republic 
联邦共和国

carry out or put into practice 
实施，执行
The group's idea will be implemented immediately.
这个小组的建议将很快得到实施。
The government promised to implement a new program to control pollution. 
政府承诺要执行新的计划以控制污染。

1. a group of people with a special purpose
组织 
World Trade Organization
世界贸易组织
World Health Organization 
世界卫生组织
2. the adjusting or planning of parts so as to form an effective whole
组织，安排
Several programs have been delayed by poor organization. 
几个项目由于组织不力而被耽搁。
I think the organization of the book is not good.
我认为这本书的结构安排不好。

come or appear
出现
The sun emerged from behind the clouds. 
太阳从云层后面钻了出来。
A man with a gun in his hand suddenly emerged from behind a tree. 
一个手中持枪的男子突然从树后出现。

a large set of lines, wires, etc., that cross or meet one another
网络
China's railway network
中国的铁路网
the network of communication
通信网络

fight or struggle against
斗争
The doctor spent his life combating disease. 
这位医生一生都在与疾病作斗争。
The policeman lost his life when combating the thief with a gun. 
这位警察在与持枪小偷搏斗时牺牲了。

fighting or battle
斗争
The combat between good and evil will continue forever. 
善与恶的斗争将永远持续下去。

(usu. pl.) a possession (esp. of a country) in the form of wealth or goods
资源
This country is rich in oil resources.
这个国家有丰富的石油资源。
Because of lack of money, the company had to use its resources creatively. 
由于缺乏资金，公司只好创造性地利用其资源。

producing new and fresh ideas and things
创造性的; 有创造力的
This is an example of the creative use of the idea.
这是创造性运用这一理论的实例。
创造性地; 有创造力地

1. a person who pays a business person, esp. a lawyer for help and advice 
当事人
The lawyer spent a whole day talking with his client about the case.
律师就该案子与当事人谈了一天。                               
His client was a middle-aged man who lost his wife two months ago. 
他的当事人是一位两个月前丧偶的男性。                                
2. a customer
顾客
The company required its clients to pay their bills in advance. 
这家公司要求顾客预先支付费用。
The shop took some new measures to attract more clients. 
这家商店采取一些新措施以吸引更多的顾客。

录像，录像机
I'm going to record that television play on my video. 
我打算用录像机把那部电视剧录下来。
Videos on English learning are often played in the department. 
这个系经常放映有关英语学习的录像。

1.[U] the act of making sth. known to the public; the offering of sth. printed for sale 
公布，发表；出版，发行
那个政府不允许发表任何不利于国家利益的新闻。
2.[C] sth. printed
出版物
The number of publications printed by presses increases every year. 
出版社出版物的数量每年都在增加。

teach; train the nature of
教育
You should educate your children to mind their manners. 
你应该教育孩子注意行为举止。
The cost of educating children has risen in China. 
在中国让孩子接受教育的费用已提高了。

of education
教育的
The educational methods of the West were introduced into the country. 
这个国家引进了西方的教育方法。
He has been doing educational work for 20 years.
他从事教育工作已有20年。

a person who educates
教育工作者；教育家

not long ago
最近
I have only recently begun to learn French. 
我最近才开始学法语。
He has not been feeling well recently. 
最近他身体感觉不太好。

the point that is halfway between south and east
东南  
the southeast of China 
中国东南部
The plane was flying toward the southeast. 
飞机在朝东南方向飞行。

the state of being able to read and/or write
文化；识字
They were required to take part in the literacy movement. 
他们被要求参加识字运动。                             
It is reported that the literacy rate is very low in the rural areas. 
据报道这个地区的受教育率很低。
低文化水平

1. written works which are of artistic value
文学
British literature 
英国文学
literature courses 
文学课程
2. printed material giving information
资料
Have you any literature about the car? 
你有关于汽车的资料吗？
He handed out the literature about AIDS to the students. 
他把有关艾滋病的资料发给学生。

find an answer to or a way of dealing with
解决，解答
It took him three hours to solve the mathematics problem. 
他花了三个小时解答这道数学难题。                          
How are you going to solve the questions put forward？
你打算怎样解决人们所提出的这些问题？

cause sth. to happen or exist
创造
She could create a fight out of anything. 
她什么时候都能制造是非争端！

show the meaning of (sth.) by giving related pictures or examples 
说明
His story illustrates her skill in dealing with the problem. 
他所讲的故事说明了她处理这个问题的技巧。                              
He illustrated his idea with many examples and pictures.
他用许多实例和图片说明自己的观点。

1. tell (a story)
讲述
We related our troubles to him, asking his advice. 
我们向他讲述我们的困难，征求他的意见。
She had no opportunity to relate the situation to him. 
她没有机会对他说这些情况。                              
2. see or show a joining between
将... ... 联系起来
I can't relate the two ideas. 
我不能把这两个观点联系起来。
I can' relate what he does to what he says. 
我不能把他说的和他做的联系起来。

set up (esp. a school, an organization, etc.) 
建立, 创办
The company was established in 1958. 
这家公司创立于1958年。                           
The public school for girls was established at the beginning of the century. 
这所公立女子学校建立于本世纪初。

sth. or sb. that fights or triumphs over  the actual wrong or negative activity
克星  
The policeman was known as a drug buster. 
这位警察被称作毒贩克星。
The medicine is a cold buster. 
这种药可以治疗感冒。

a danger
危险，风险
The disease is spreading and all the children are at risk. 
这种疾病正在蔓延，所有孩子都处于危险之中。                               
You have to take a lot of risks in my job. 
做我的工作，你要冒诸多风险。

place in danger; take the chance of losing 
冒着... ... 的危险 
He would like to risk his life to save his friend.
他愿意冒生命危险救自己的朋友。

a fully grown person or animal
成年（人或动物）
He acts like an adult although he's very young. 
尽管他很年轻，举止却像成年人。                               
Only adults are allowed to see the film.
这部电影只允许成年人看。

the conditions of work, a way of living, etc. which cause worry, stress and difficulty 
压力
We put pressure on the government to change this law. 
我们对政府施加压力，要求政府修改这一法律。                             
He only agreed to leave the country under pressure. 
他只是在压力之下才答应离开这个国家的。

give the meaning of; describe exactly
下定义，描述
Some words are hard to define. 
很难对有些词下定义。
In this paragraph the writer defined the term. 
作者在这一段中解释了这个术语。

consider sth. in a new way
重新考虑
The teacher was asked to redefine the use of the new teaching methods. 
这位教师被要求重新考虑新 教学方法的运用。                               
The role of women in social life is being redefined. 
妇女在社会生活中的作用正在得到重新考虑。

a person's family, experience, and education
出身背景, 经历; 背景资料
I need a bit more background before I can help you.
在帮助你之前， 我需要先了解更多有关你的情况。            
He came to know all of John's background. 
他逐渐了解了所有有关约翰的背景情况。

annoy by repeated action
缠绕，烦扰
They plagued the teacher with many questions. 
他们用许多问题来烦老师。

瘟疫,鼠疫; 灾难,祸患
The question of his future has plagued him recently. 
最近她一直在为自己的前途问题苦恼。
His home area suffered from a plague of dry weather last year. 
去年他的家乡遭受了旱灾。

1. a business or an organization
机构,企业
The two hotels are both excellent establishments. 
这两家宾馆都是优秀企业。                               
The local government controlled all the printing establishments.
当地政府控制着所有印刷企业。
2. the act of setting up 
建立,确立；确定
The group will work toward the establishment of schools for the poor.
这个团体将致力于为穷人创办学校。

lay stress on
强调
I must emphasize the fact that they are only children. 
我必须强调他们还只是孩子。                              
He emphasized that everyone was at risk for the disease. 
他强调说每个人都有感染这种疾病的危险。

whatever may happen; (~of) not influenced by
无论如何
I must make the decision regardless. 
不管怎么样，我必须做出决定。
He went there regardless of the risk. 
尽管有危险, 他还是去那儿了。

(to) an answer to a problem
解决,解答
It's difficult to find a solution to this problem. 
很难找到一个解决这个问题的办法。
If a solution is found, then go on with the next stage. 
如果找到了解决办法，那就着手做下一步的工作。

moment of great danger or difficulty
危机
The President had to quit his job for he wasn't able to deal with the crisis. 
总统因为不能处理这起危机，只好辞职。
He has reached a crisis in his illness. 
他的病情已十分危急。

1. show; be a sign of; stand for
表示, 表明
This painting represents a storm at sea. 
这幅图画表现了大海起风暴的情景。 
The red lines on this map represent railway tracks. 
地图上的红线代表铁路。
2. act or speak officially for(another person or people)
作为... ...的代表(或代理)
The manager couldn't go to the meeting, so his secretary represented him. 
经理不能去开会，所以他的秘书代表他去。

a widely or rapidly spreading disease; the spread of a  disease that infects others
流行病；传染病的蔓延    
The doctor took great trouble in controlling the epidemic. 
医生千方百计防治这种流行病。                              
Drug researcher says the new medicine would help put an end to the epidemic. 
药物专家说这种新药有助于消灭这种流行病。

express or be a warning that one is going to hurt, punish , etc.
扬言；威胁
Traffic noise threatens our peaceful way of life
车辆噪音威胁着我们宁静的生活。
She threatens to kill the man. 
她扬言要杀死这个男人。

connected with race
种族的
The political official devoted his life to getting rid of racial hate. 
这位政治家一生致力于消除种族仇恨。
Their acts of racial control must be stopped. 
他们的种族控制行为必须加以制止。

the quality of being able to do a task successfully, without wasting time or energy 
效率
There are many ways of increasing agricultural efficiency. 
提高农业效率的方法有许多。                              
The use of these machines has increased our efficiency many times. 
使用这些机器使我们的效率提高了许多倍。

the quality of being unable to do a task successfully
效率低下，无效
The inefficiency of the program has led to the loss of millions of tons of food. 
这一计划实施无效，造成了数百万吨粮食的损失。                               
He received serious critical comments on his inefficiency in the work. 
他由于工作效率低而受到严厉批评。

Definitions.PartofSpeech:
have or carry (a disease) 
感染(疾病)
The whole class were infected with the virus. 
全班学生都感染上了这种病毒。

instead of 
代替
William talked at the meeting in place of the manager who was sick. 
威廉代替身体不适的经理在会上作了发言, 。

experience (sth. unpleasant, e.g. an illness) 
受... ...之苦,患(某种疾病)
10 percent of the children in the city were suffering from this disease. 
这座城市有10%的儿童得了这种疾病。

1. give to each person in a group 
分发;
It is not an easy job to pass out the papers to so many students. 
将试卷分发给这么多学生并不容易。
2. faint 
晕倒
She passed out at the news that her parents were killed. 
听到父母亲被杀害的消息,她晕倒了。

therefore 
因此,结果
He broke his leg, and as a result, he had to be away from school for two or three months.
他腿断了，此他只好两三个月不上学。

in danger
有危险,有风险
The doctor said that everyone was at risk for AIDS.
医生说每个人都有染上艾滋病的危险。

not influenced by 
不顾,不管
She married the young man regardless of her parents' objecting.
她不顾父母的反对，嫁给了这个年轻人。

the answer to 
......的解答; 解决(解答) ......的办法
So far a solution to the crisis hasn't been found yet.
迄今为止还没有找到解决危机的办法。

give warning that one may hurt or punish
扬言要......
Bob threatened to set fire to Jane's house. 
鲍勃扬言要烧毁简的房子。

take one's attention from
使分心         
Please turn off the TV because the noise will distract the children from their homework. 
请把电视机关掉,因为噪音会使孩子们分心,不能专心做作业。

(cause to) sign an agreement to take part in sth. 
报名参加; 签约参加工作(或组织)
I hope more people sign up at the match. 
我希望有更多的人报名参加这次比赛。

Definitions.Paraphrase:
【医】Acquired Immune Deficiency Syndrome 
艾滋病/爱滋病

【医】Human Immunodeficiency Virus 
艾滋病病毒, 人体免疫缺损病毒
